mil3.4.3:1.2: “bhante nagasena, yanimani pancayatanani, kim nu tani nanakammehi nibbattani, udahu ekena kammena”ti?
mil3.4.3:2.2: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, ekasmim khette nanabijani vappeyyum, tesam nanabijanam nanaphalani nibbatteyyun”ti?
mil3.4.3:2.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, yani yani pancayatanani, tani tani nanakammehi nibbattani, na ekena kammena”ti.
